detail_desc: Blouse in soft washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Short flounced sleeves and a tie at the hem.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Welt side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Dress in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Gloves in a felted wool blend with ribbing at the top and an adjustable tab with press-studs. Fleece lining.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, flap leg pockets and gently tapered legs.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and frilled hems.
Rib-knit top in a nylon blend with short sleeves and a wrapover front with a tie at the side.
Short dress in an airy weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, long raglan sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem. Partly lined in pile. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Socks knitted in a soft, patterned cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top of the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, short, wide sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit top and woven, flared, lined skirt.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, 3/4-length sleeves and a drawstring at the front. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top and concealed press-studs on one shoulder.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, flutter sleeves, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and gently rounded hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking at the top and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and gently flared, lined skirt.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and slim legs.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy rib knit with a round, scalloped neckline and long sleeves with trumpet cuffs.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, adjustable multiway spaghetti straps and a wide elastic trim at the hem. No fasteners.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Chunky metal chain anklet. Adjustable length approx. 20-27 cm.
Calf-length pleated dress in airy chiffon in a double layer at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening at the top.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in different colours of washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ballet shoes in shimmering metallic fabric. Wide elastic gore at the top and narrow elastication around the opening. Woven fabric linings and insoles and suede soles.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a concealed zip at the back and belt with D-rings. Sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Knee-high boots in soft, supple suede with pointed toes. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Covered block heels 8 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Cotton canvas trainers with concealed elastication under the tongue and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned, crêpe weave with a flounce and elastication at the top, long, flared sleeves and a drawstring at the hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Dress with long sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Leggings with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the dress and leggings is organic.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a print motif and appliqués on the front and straps that cross and have adjustable fastenings at the back. Gathered seam at the top, elastication at the back of the waist and patch front pockets. Top with an all-over print, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

V-neck blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a wrapover front that fastens with concealed ties, a hook-and-eye fastener and narrow ties at one side. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
A pair of metal earrings.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, ties and buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long puff sleeves with slits and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, sewn-on decorative bow at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide-fitting top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Over-the-knee socks in a soft pattern knit with ribbed tops.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, straight crêpe dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke, short sleeves and a seam with a flounce at the top. Unlined.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Satin bomber jacket with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Lined.
Shorts in organic cotton slub jersey in various designs with an elasticated waist.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Height of soles 4.5 cm. Heel 5 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bustier in a cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, ties at the front and smocking at the back. Lined front.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top. V-neck with a sewn-on bow at the front and a seam at the waist.
Oversized cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped, diagonal front pockets and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, small embroidery detail on the chest and buttoned cuffs.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in smocked fabric with overlocked, frilled edges. High waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
